00006   $Log: dl40x.h,v $
00007   Revision 1.1  2004/09/22 10:36:51  mucap
00008   First commit of crate program for fall 2004 run.  It currently supports
00009   all modules in the two 6U VME crates (CAEN V767 TDC, SIS FIFO, DL40x flash
00010   ADCs) and the CAMAC modules that will be in the fast readout.
00011 
00012   Revision 1.2  2003/05/29 17:30:08  mucap
00013   Changed FADC readout to start at the "oldest" sample rather than the
00014   first byte of the buffer.
00015 
00016   Revision 1.1  2003/05/01 08:28:50  mucap
00017 
00018   FADC integration is now complete.  Piotr's old FADC code is now employed by
00019   crate3.cpp in order to operate the FADCs.

00046 #ifndef STRUCK_DL40X_H
00047 #define STRUCK_DL40X_H
00048 
00049 /* ====================   STRUCK DL401 VME FLASH ADC ========================*/
00050 #define DL401_MAXMODULES  16
00051 
00052 #define DL401_NCHAN        4 /* number of inputs per module   */
00053 #define DL401_PEDCHANBITS  6
00054 #define DL401_PEDCHANMASK 0x3F /* pedestal mask (one chan)    */
00055 #define DL401_PEDBITMASK  0x00800000 /* pedestal bit mask     */ 
00056 #define DL401_PEDBITS     24 
00057 #define DL401_PEDMASK     0x00FFFFFF /* pedestal mask         */
00058 #define DL401_CNTMASK     0x03FF
00059 #define DL401_CNTMAX      0x0400
00060 
00061 /* ---------------  16 bit word access ---------------------  */
00062 #define DL401_ICNV     0x02 /* Internal CoNVert (D0)      (R) */
00063 #define DL401_CLIF     0x02 /* Clear Interrupt Flag       (W) */
00064 #define DL401_WDAC     0x12 /* Write serial DAC data      (W) */
00065 #define DL401_MRST     0x22 /* Module ReSeT               (W) */
00066 #define DL401_BASE     0x52 /* load BASE address (0x00)   (W) */
00067 #define DL401_MASK     0x62 /* MASK word (see below)      (W) */
00068 #define DL401_MODE     0x72 /* MODE word (see below)    (R/W) */
00069 #define DL401_RMAD     0x90 /* Read Memory ADdres counter (R) */
00070 
00071 
00072 /* ---------------  DL401 MASK (0x50/0x52) BITS ------------- */
00073 #define DL401_SMODSIZ  0x000f  /* load SubMODule SIZe (==0)   */
00074 #define DL401_ADDRMOD  0x3f00  /* load ADDress MODifier       */
00075 #define DL401_ADDRMSH  8       /* ADDress Modifier SHift      */
00076 #define VME_AM_EXT_USR_DATA    0x09
00077 #define DL401_AM_EXT_MODE (VME_AM_EXT_USR_DATA << DL401_ADDRMSH)
00078 #define DL401_AM_STD_MODE (VME_AM_STD_USR_DATA << DL401_ADDRMSH)
00079 #define DL401_LWIOENA  0x8000  /* Long Word I/O ENAble        */
00080 
00081 /* ---------------  DL401 MODE (0x70/0x72) BITS ------------- */
00082 #define DL401_IRQVEC   0x00ff  /* Interrupt VECtor      (R/W) */
00083 #define DL401_IRQPRI   0x0700  /* Interrupt PRIority    (R/W) */
00084 #define DL401_IRQMOD   0x0800  /* Interrupt MODe        (R/W) */
00085 
00086 #define DL401_DEFMODE  0x0000  /* DEFault  MODe          (W)  */
00087 #define DL401_INTMODE  0x1000  /* INTernal MODe          (W)  */
00088 #define DL401_EXTMODE  0xefff  /* EXTernal MODe          (W)  */
00089 #define DL401_INTGATE  0x2000  /* internal gate          (W)  */
00090 #define DL401_EXTGATE  0xdfff  /* external gate          (W)  */
00091 #define DL401_DACWDIS  0x4000  /* DAC Write DISable      (W)  */
00092 #define DL401_DACWENA  0xbfff  /* DAC Write ENAble       (W)  */
00093 #define DL401_AUTOMODE 0x8000  /* AUTOstop MODE enable   (W)  */
00094 #define DL401_CONTMODE 0x7fff  /* CONTinuous MODE enable (W)  */
00095 
00096 #define DL401_ASTOPACT 0x1000  /* :0 auto stop active          */
00097 #define DL401_INTREQ   0x2000  /* :1 internal interrupt request*/
00098 #define DL401_RDAC     0x4000  /* Read serial DAQ output       */
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 /* ====================   STRUCK DL403 VME 100MHz CLOCK =====================*/
00103 #define DL403_MAXMODULES  4
00104 #define DL403_CYCLESNUM   3
00105 
00106 /* DL403 register offsets */
00107 #define DL403_CYCLE1  0x02
00108 #define DL403_CYCLE2  0x04
00109 #define DL403_CYCLE3  0x06
00110 #define DL403_RATE    0x08
00111 #define DL403_START   0x0a
00112 #define DL403_STOP    0x0c
00113 #define DL403_MODE    0x72
00114 #define DL403_RESET   0x22
00115 
00116 /* DL403 clock defines */
00117 #define DL403_EXTERN   0x00
00118 #define DL403_SELECTED 0x01
00119 #define DL403_50MHZ    0x02
00120 #define DL403_100MHZ   0x03
00121 
00122 /* DL403 modes */
00123 #define DL403_ASYNC   0x1000
00124 #define DL403_CONT    0x2000
00125 #define DL403_STEADY  0x4000
00126 
00127 #define DL403_RUN     0x1000
00128 #define DL403_RUNSHFT 12
00129 
00130 #define DL403_GO      0xffff /* used for start/stop commands */
00131 
00132 INT   dl401_init        (struct dl401 *d);
00133 void           dl401_teardown     ();
00134 INLINE void    dl401_setup       (struct dl401 *  d, u_short bs, u_short am, u_short md);
00135 INLINE int     dl401_setPedestals(struct dl401 * d, u_short p[], int np);
00136 INLINE u_long  dl401_getPedestals(struct dl401 * d);
00137 INLINE u_short dl401_getCounts   (struct dl401 * d);
00138 INLINE u_short dl401_getMode     (struct dl401 * d);
00139 INLINE u_short dl401_getMask     (struct dl401 * d);
00140 INLINE void    dl401_clear       (struct dl401 * d);
00141 INLINE void    dl401_reset       (struct dl401 * d);
00142 INLINE void    dl401_convert     (struct dl401 * d);
00143 INLINE int     dl401_finished    (struct dl401 * d);
00144 INLINE int     dl401_read        (struct dl401 * d, u_int *data);
00145 INLINE int     dl401_dmaread     (struct dl401 * d, u_int *data);
00146 
00147 INT dl403_init         (struct dl403 *d);
00148 
00149 void         dl403_setClockRate (struct dl403 * d, u_short clk1, u_short clk2, u_short clk3);
00150 void         dl403_setClockCycle(struct dl403 * d, u_short cyc1, u_short cyc2, u_short cyc3);
00151 INLINE void  dl403_asyncMode    (struct dl403 * d);
00152 INLINE void  dl403_contMode     (struct dl403 * d);
00153 INLINE void  dl403_steadyMode   (struct dl403 * d); 
00154 INLINE short dl403_runBit       (struct dl403 * d);
00155 INLINE void  dl403_start        (struct dl403 * d);
00156 INLINE void  dl403_stop         (struct dl403 * d); 
00157 INLINE void  dl403_reset        (struct dl403 * d); 
00158 INLINE short dl403_running      (struct dl403 * d);

00161 #endif
